did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Amherst County: clerk of county court, list of tickets, 1787

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Auditor of Public Accounts, Amherst County: clerk of county court, list of tickets, 1787. Accession APA 448. State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These records are part of Auditor of Public Accounts. Administration of State Government: Revenue Assessment and Collection - Fees and Licenses. A ticket was a promise to pay the county court clerk a fee owed him. This list was copied from the fee book of the clerk and turned over to the sheriff for collection.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged alphabetically by subject of record.

did.unittitle: Amherst County: clerk of county court, list of tickets, 1787.
